message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $10000. I believe it's a steal considering its value.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a little closer to my asking price. How about $9750?  I believe this is fair given the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am willing to pay $9600 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
